text: The following lists events that happened in 1955 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Ásgeir Ásgeirsson *Prime Minister - Ólafur Thors ==Events== ==Births== Guðjón Þórðarson *20 April - Steinunn Thorarinsdottir, sculptor *8 May - Ásgeir Sigurvinsson, footballer *17 July - Valgerður Gunnarsdóttir, politician. *31 July - Kolbrún Halldórsdóttir, politician *4 August - Steingrímur J. Sigfússon, politician *14 September - Guðjón Þórðarson, footballer. *2 December - Einar Kristinn Guðfinnsson, politician ==Deaths== ==References== Category:1950s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1955 in Iceland
